instruction.value: DAY 0. Administer 30 to 60 minutes pre-transplant. May be administered by IV route.
DAY 1 of 21. If oral diphenhydrAMINE has not been taken by patient as instructed, administer 60 minutes pre-PACLitaxel. May be administered by IV route.
DAY 1 of 21. PRN. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 1 of 7. If oral diphenhydrAMINE has not been taken by patient as instructed, administer 60 minutes pre-PACLitaxel. May be administered by IV route.
DAY 1 of 7. PRN. May be administered by IV route.
DAY 1 of 21. PRN. May be administered by IV route.

population.value: Adjuvant PACLitaxel/CARBOplatin. Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
PACLitaxel / CARBOplatin. Advanced / Metastatic Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
PACLitaxel/CARBOplatin (Weekly) and concurrent RT. Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer.
